title: Elba vs Block
overview: Car enthusiast Idris Elba and world-renowned rally driver Ken Block go head to head in a series of exhilarating car challenges that are sure to have you jumping from your seats. The eight-episode show will pit the two against each other to see who can outperform the other, from The Wall of death to the Flaming Obstacle Course, this is sure to be an adrenaline -fuelled ride from start to finish.
